text: Shibiram is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by TS Suresh Babu and starring Manoj K Jayan and Divya Unni in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Manoj K Jayan as Kochu Varkey, Sajan Devassya (double role) * Divya Unni as Minikutty *Sukumaran as Devassya *Vijayaraghavan as Kunjeppu, Tony Anthony(double role) *Jose Prakash as Senior Kunjeppu *Rajan P Dev as Itti Anthony *Narendra Prasad as Antony *Rizabawa as Peter *Kalabhavan Mani as Thomasuktty *Baby Swamy as Senior Kochu Varkey *Suchithra as Shiney *Baburaj as CI Mohan Shankar *Saikumar as Xavier *Shivaji as Thankachayan *Sreenath as James *Bindu Panikker as Alice *Sonia Baiju Kottarakkara as Gracy *Khadeeja as Nun, Hostel Warden *Aliyar as Priest ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films based on Malayalam novels
title: Shibiram
